oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Pros and cons of mentoring
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miles, Delbert G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine
practice
mentor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mentoring is a situation where both parties can win. While teaching another individual, it is amazing how much the mentor learns. The mentee will bring new information, and should challenge the paradigms of the mentor, resulting in both individuals growing in knowledge.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2018 Recent Graduate Proceedings; 26
